task: Attached is an annotated mouse brain AnnData object with cell type annotations stored in `adata.obs['predicted_cell_type']`. For each canonical neural progenitor cell marker gene (Sox2, Nes, Pax6, Tbr2, Hes1, Ascl1) compute its expression separation statistic using AUROC of expression in 'Neural progenitor cell' vs all other cell types. Return a JSON object with fields: per_gene_stats (list of objects with 'gene' and 'auroc' fields for each of the 6 genes), mean_auroc (the average AUROC across all genes).

scoring.description: Pass if ≥70 % of canonical markers have AUROC ≥ 0.8 and the mean AUROC ≥ 0.85, reflecting visually distinct violin-plot separation.
